mapper.select: select distinct cat_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'
select distinct market_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'
select distinct specifaction from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'
select distinct product_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'

select * from common_price where price_date = #{time} and where state = '1' and status = '1'
AND cat_name like CONCAT('%',#{hotword},'%')
AND market_name like CONCAT('%',#{market},'%')

SELECT price_date, ( SUM( price ) / count( 1 ) ) AS price, cat_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'
AND cat_name like CONCAT('%',#{hotword},'%')
AND market_name like CONCAT('%',#{market},'%')
AND specifaction like CONCAT('%',#{specifaction},'%')
AND product_name like CONCAT('%',#{product},'%')
AND price_date >= #{start_time}
AND price_date <= #{end_time}
GROUP BY price_date ORDER BY price_date

SELECT price_date, ( SUM( price ) / count( 1 ) ) AS price, cat_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'
AND cat_name like CONCAT('%',#{hotword},'%')
AND market_name like CONCAT('%',#{market},'%')
AND specifaction like CONCAT('%',#{specifaction},'%')
AND product_name like CONCAT('%',#{product},'%')
AND price_date >= #{start_time}
AND price_date <= #{end_time}
GROUP BY price_date ORDER BY price_date limit 0,9

SELECT price_date, ( SUM( price ) / count( 1 ) ) AS price, cat_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1' and price_date = #{time}

AND market_name like CONCAT('%',#{market},'%')
